meanings.definition: To roll or move in a circular manner.
meanings.sent1: The ball will roule down the hill.
meanings.sent2: The wheels of the car roule smoothly on the road.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy likes to roule around in the grass.
meanings.sent4: Time seems to roule by quickly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The waves roule gently onto the shore, creating a calming sound.

meanings.sent1: I bought some roule from the market for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The creamy roule tasted delicious with crackers.
meanings.sent3: The chef used roule to make a flavorful sauce for the pasta.
meanings.sent4: The roule added a rich and creamy texture to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The roule was the star of the cheese platter, enticing everyone to try it.
